detail: SAP Activate is a modular and agile framework designed by SAP to streamline the implementation and migration to SAP solutions such as SAP S/4HANA. It replaced the older ASAP (Accelerated SAP) and SAP Launch methodologies, providing a unified approach for cloud, on-premise, and hybrid deployments.

howToPlay.objective: Arrange ERP steps in the correct order.
steps: Drag and drop them into the correct sequence
howToPlay.winCondition: All steps are placed in the correct order

ui.title: Arrange the Solution Building Process
ui.instruction: Select the steps in the order typically followed when building an enterprise solution.
